author: craigmcc
msg: Return error 400 if the user uses invalid characters (including %00 and
%7f) in a URI.  This fixes a security vulnerability, present in 4.0-b4,
that exposes JSP source code when you request:
This is the same vulnerability that Marc just patched in 3.2.2.

author: remm
msg: - Revert the commit on URL connection.

author: remm
msg: - The resource existence check was incorrect when using a URL, which
was breaking reloading in some cases.
This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag 'tomcat_40_b4'.
